tools.title: Cohort Discovery
tools.description: The cohort discovery application is designed to assist researchers, clinicians, and data scientists in quickly identifying and exploring subsets of individuals from large datasets based on specific criteria.

tools.title: Canine Data Commons Data Visualization Notebook
tools.description: Download node files, show/select data, and plot with this notebook using data hosted on the Canine Data Commons (https://caninedc.org) stored under the NHGRI project.
